channel.title: Blog do Leo
channel.description: Recent content on Blog do Leo

item.title: Have you played...? Ann
item.description: “My name is Ann” I’m at the point in my Steam games library where I can’t remember why I have some games - that’s the case for this one. Maybe I’m just a a sucker for meganekko. Actually, I think it was because I came across this funny Youtube video and decided to see what else the creator had done. From the cover and promotional art (I hadn’t read the synopsis at all), I thought this was a side scrolling adventure or visual novel of some sort, but Ann is actually an RPG horror game made in RPG Maker.

item.title: (Piano cover) OMORI - Duet
item.description: Composed by Pedro Silva Arrangement by Pianobin One of the most beautiful and touching moments in videogame history.

item.title: (Piano cover) OMORI - By Your Side
item.description: Composed by Pedro Silva Arrangement by salmonghoul on MuseScore “You’ll forgive yourself… Won’t you… SUNNY?”
